pages.text: and that which is in the bosoms is made to appear (i.e. secrets are revealed)
certainly on that day, their Fosterer is fully informed about them
The calamity
What is the calamity
And what will make you realize what the calamity is? (It will befall on)
the day when mankind will be like scattered moths
and the mountains will be like loosened wool
Then as for him whose weights (of good deeds) are heavy
then he will lead a life of pleasure
And as for him whose weights (of good deeds) are light
then his home* will be in a deep pit (of hell). * Destination
And what will make you realize what the (deep pit of hell) is
(It is a) very hot fire
Rivalry in worldly increase distracts you (from the remembrance of Allah)
till you come to the graves
No, you will know
Again, no, you will know
No, if you know (having) the knowledge that is certain
you will definitely see hell fire
Then you will definitely see it with the eye of certainty
Then on that day you will definitely be questioned about the comforts
